text:
Created attachment 24750
shows all references to c:\program files (x86)\Apache Software Foundation\Apache2\Apache2.2\htdocs deleted.

Can not get the directory alias feature to work. Always defaults to:
c:\program files (x86)\Apache Software Foundation\Apache2\Apache2.2\htdocs.
Have commented out all instances of above path in httpd.conf and added aliases that worked before under Windows XP 32 bit.
creator: halwas01@gmail.com
covener@gmail.com
text:
UAC can make editing files tricky. See 
http://wiki.apache.org/httpd/WindowsVistaPlatform
or subscribe to the Apache HTTP Server users list for help with running your system.
Also tried version 2.0.63 - Alias feature also does not work under Windows 7 64 bit.
creator: halwas01@gmail.com

text:
(In reply to comment #1)
> UAC can make editing files tricky. See 
> http://wiki.apache.org/httpd/WindowsVistaPlatform
> or subscribe to the Apache HTTP Server users list for help with running your
> system.

Had no problem editing the httpd.conf file.
Aliasing does not work under Windows 7 64 Bit.
